ProductInfo.Features:
1) Quad band, Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz 2) Single SIM Card 3) Display Size : 1.8 inch touch screen 4) Ringtones Type : Polyphonic / MP3
5) Audio File format : MP3 / MIDI 6) Video File format : 3GP / MPEG4 (AVI) 7) Image File format : JPEG / BMP / GIF 8) E-book format : TXT
9) FM Radio 85-110 MHz (Worldwide) 10) Data Transfer : USB / Bluetooth 11) Input : Handwriting 12) Camera : 1.3 Mega pixels digital camera
13) Support Video recorder, Sound recorder 14) Messaging : SMS / MMS 15) Built in 250.5KB memory, Support TF Card, Max 4GB. 16) Languages (option): English, Spanish, Russian, Indonesian, Polish, Simple Chinese, Greek, Persian, Malay, Indonesian, Bulgarian , Arabic, Italian
17) Other function: Calendar /Task / Alarm / Calculator / E-book reader / Stopwatch / World Clock 18) Dimension: 247 x 51 x 15mm 19) li-ion battery: 3.7V 450mAh 20) Weight: 59g (including battery)
ProductInfo.Name: K1 Black, Watch Mobile Phone with Camera, Torch Bluetooth FM Touch Screen Watch Mobile phone, Single SIM Card, Quad band, GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz
